Computer.file:
"The nameless was the beginning of Heaven and Earth The named was the mother of the myriad creatures. Hence always rid yourselves of desires In order to observe its secrets; But always allow yourself to have desires In order to observe its manifestations."
Vau, the third letter of the name of God, and the third branch of the Tree of Life. The perspective shifts, and changes. What was mundane is now celestial. The wanderer opens her eyes, and sees the new.

SOLVE ET COAGULA
To create the new, one must dissolve the old... ...and then... ...come together, as new. This applies to both physical and metaphysical concepts; the idea is a broad one, steeped in history. It happens to many. They don't even realize it's happening, sometimes.
